summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to apply for and execute a grant agreement under the United States Small Business Administration Tree Planting Initiative proposal; authorizing the acceptance and deposit of the grant funds when received; authorizing the purchase, and the planting of trees in street rights-of-way authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts; authorizing an increase of an expenditure allowance in the 1995 Engineering Department budget; and making an appropriation therefor.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
